Set Permissions chmod a+x name.sh

Shell Script Arguments
./name.sh Hans-Wolfgang Loidl 
 
#!/bin/bash
# example of using arguments to a script
echo "My first name is $1"
echo "My surname is $2"
echo "Total number of arguments is $#"
